results.content: The course is comprehensive.  The instructor covers a lot of content.  I did have to pause the videos often in order to catch up to him and therefore it took longer than I thought it would.  However, it was well worth it in the end.  Thank you.
results.content_html: The course is comprehensive. The instructor covers a lot of content. I did have to pause the videos often in order to catch up to him and therefore it took longer than I thought it would. However, it was well worth it in the end. Thank you.

results.content:
The course was very good. I learned a lot. 

I think the instructor could spent more time explaining some functions that C#.net has and to explain in more detail way.

Good voice, showed everything, exercises and solution.

I recommend
